Flight_generator¶

This module defines the FlightGenerator class. .. note:: This module requires Python 3.6 or later.

Flight_generator.generate_flight()¶

Generates a random flight detail.

Returns: tuple: A tuple containing 5 elements: flight number (str), airline name (str), arrival date (str), arrival time (str), and passenger count (int).

Flight_generator.generate_random_flights(size)¶

Generates a list of random flight details and writes them to a text file named “flights.txt”.

Args: size (int): The number of flight details to generate.

Returns: list: A list of flight details, where each detail is a tuple containing 5 elements: flight number (str), airline name (str), arrival date (str), arrival time (str), and passenger count (int).
